name: Sluggish Morss: Pattern Circus
description:
Explore an intricate, tactile world full of feverish, intertwining stories told with humour, irreverence and melancholy.

Another Time Expression, a temporal interference phenomenon, has been predicted leaving those that govern anxious. Will the Bapar intercept the Projectionists in the evitable reversing of Time/ Space/ Consciousness? A candle spins on a turntable as an imposter steals your likeness. Become habituated to things that have not yet happened. We make meaning. We see patterns. We solve problems.

There was a book that meant something different to every reader, even though the words and phrases were the same. It was an extension to the mind. When reread, the reader would determine that they read it well enough the first time.

FOR JUST £15 GET THE INCREDIBLE EXTENDED SOUNDTRACK INCLUDED!

CREDITS:

devised by Jack King-Spooner (if you don't like it, direct grumbles to him)

amazing sounds by Helena Celle buy her sublime music here or support her on Patreon for monthly amazing sounds

Additional personnel: The beautiful Charlotte Strawbridge, the bewitching Beth Sbresni
